actors

Class GameMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • actors.GameMaster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class GameMaster
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener
    This Class is the GameMaster. The GameMaster observes the game and moves the Player, manages game rules etc.

      • checkMove

        public boolean checkMove(java.lang.String target,
                java.lang.String playerPos)
        Takes parameter direction and player position. Checks if the room has a door at this direction. If yes, return true, if not, return false.

      • movePlayer

        public void movePlayer(java.lang.String direction)
        Checks if player is able to move to given direction. If true setPosition to room lying in this direction.

      • getMagicRoom

      • getPlayerRoom

        public AbstractRoom getPlayerRoom()
        Searches for the room, where player is positioned.
        Returns:
        room where Id = player.getPosition()
